attributes.action: Gift vouchers to have no expiry date if purchased with cash
attributes.background: I was presented with £50 vouchers on my retirement. I held on to them until I found something I could use them for but when I went to redeem them for a shirt I was told they had expired by 19 days and that I couldn't use them. Company had effectively had a 2year interest free loan and not repaid it.

rejection.details:
At the moment, this is the responsibility of retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take action, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like them to do.
